question: Koh-choā tōa-hūn hō-chē ê ji̍t-chū (long-term debt due within one year) kap (long-term debt)，lâi kàu 2006 kàu 2007 ê kî-kan，che̍k-tè ê kòe-tō͘ tōa-ke-sī séng-chèng？
answer: long-term debt due within one year

question: 2007 'long-term debt' kah 'equity' ê siòng-tshú sī siánn-bín, ti koh bān bueh nn̄g?
2006 niáⁿ kàu 2007 niáⁿ, 'tsóng-kè hāi' ê tōa-chē, koh-chāi chha-koa-liáu tńg-lâi ê 'hiāⁿ-chîⁿ' chha-pia̍t, lóng-chóng chhiau-kòe kúi-ā-chheng bān bí-kim?
Chiu-chiat ê kong-si ê chu-kim-chèu (chí-sī 'hiān-kim' kap 'tu-koân kim-tâi') tùi 2006 kàu 2007 ê piàn-hòa chóaⁿ chìn-hêng phoe-sek.
answer: Tùi 2006 kàu 2007, kong-si ê chu-kim-chèu chōng-thài chin cheng-chhiat-ê soâi-lo̍h. 'Hiàn-kim' kiám-chió liáu 53.6% (tùi $2585M kàu $1199M), chiàⁿ 'tu-koân kim-tâi tùi sô͘-thâu în-kim' kiám-chió liáu 63.0% (tùi $2013M kàu $744M). Ha̍p-tâng ê hōaⁿ-kim tâu-chu tùi $4598M soâi kàu $1943M, kiám-chió liáu 58% ê sò͘-liōng, chí-chāi khòaⁿ-bái chún-pī ê kim-kim chin cheng-chhiat-ê kiám-chió.

question: Àn 2007, chhōe chhut chi̍t-kóa chu-kim-sòe (tē 1 kàu 6 hāng) ê siong-chham, i ê kè-tí koân kòe 6,000 pah-bān bîn ê. Tùi in ê miâ-chheng lâi lia̍t chhut lâi.

2006 nî kong-si ê choân-siat hāu-tāi hō͘ kó͘-pún ê pí-lē sī siáⁿ-mih? Kè-sǹg ê hong-sek sī kā 'choân-siat hāu-tāi' tēⁿ hō͘ 'kó͘-pún', chiū-chāi hō͘ siâⁿ-kó sī siâⁿ-sò͘, pīⁿ hō͘ siâⁿ-kó tēⁿ hō͘ siâⁿ-sò͘ nn̄g ūi.
Nāi kong-si ê 'equity' tī 2007 nā-sī koâⁿ 15% tō-sī án-choáⁿ-iūⁿ, hit tang ê 'total debt plus equity minus cash' ê sin tiāⁿ-tiâu sī án-choáⁿ-iūⁿ, kî-thaⁿ ê tiāⁿ-tiâu lóng bô kái-piàn?
Koh-tu̍t 2006 chì 2007 nî ê sî-kan, 'sòaⁿ-tsóng hāi-kuè' kap 'khu-khuán' nn̄g-ê tiâu-mūi toā-tōa tōa-tiám, ē-tàng tòe che infer chūi-sè ê kong-si ê kim-li̍t hāi-kuè chè-lio̍k ū sím-mi̍h?
answer: Choân-sòaⁿ-tsóng hāi-kuè (tùi $3,532M kàu $7,215M) kap khu-khuán (tùi $14,607M kàu $19,223M) ê tâng-sî kap tōa-tōa tiám-tōa tiám, chí-sī chi̍t keng kong-si tòe chit-ê sî-kan-tuānn tòe chòe-chiok ke-tōa ê seng-tióng í-ki̍p khui-tián ê chiàn-lü̍t. I chin chiap-siū chē-chē ê chu-kim tùi hāi-kuè kap khu-khuán nn̄g-ê chāi-tōa. Che chin tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ sī teh hō͘ tōa-tōa ê tâu-chu, kè-uē í-ki̍p siu-bé lâi chòe. Cash-adjusted debt-to-capital ratio tùi 6% kàu 22% ê tōa-tōa tiám, koh chí-sī chi̍t ê chiàn-lü̍t tòe khui-tián ê koân lâi hāi-kuè ê piàn-tōng.

question: Tī 'sǹg-kè' ê khu (tē-it 8 kàu 16 hāng) lāi-bīn, ū sím-mih bīn-tâi sī chiap-siap tòe tòe ê hāng, tòe chha-chèng chèng-chóng ê chèng-chòe (tē-it 1 kàu 6 hāng)?
Heng-li̍t ê kim-chha̍t chu-liāu tiong, hô-sé ê sî-kan chha̍t koh iâⁿ khoài-thok lâi kà piàn-tōa? Chúi siâⁿ sī chòe-koân tōa-chhu-tōa lâi biáⁿ lâi bô siáⁿ-chē chin chòe.
answer: 'Chóng-chè hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi hāi million in 2007, which represents a growth of over 456%. This far outpaces the percentage change of any other metric listed, including the 267% increase in the 'cash-adjusted debt-to-capital ratio', indicating a dramatic rise in the company's net debt position.

question: 2007 ni chiah pí 2006 toā kó͘ chē-chē?
